original_text: So Samuel told all the words of the Lord to the people who were asking for a king from him.
korean_text: 사무엘이 왕을 요구하는 백성에게 여호와의 모든 말씀을 말하여

sentences.original_text: So Samuel told all the words of the Lord
sentences.korean_translation: 그래서 사무엘은 주의 모든 말씀을 일렀습니다

sentences.original_text: to the people who were asking for a king from him.
